original_text: Blessed above women shall Jael the wife of Heber the Kenite be, blessed shall she be above women in the tent.
korean_text: 겐 사람 헤벨의 아내 야엘은 다른 여인들보다 복을 받을 것이니 장막에 있는 여인들보다 더욱 복을 받을 것이로다

sentences.original_text: Blessed above women shall Jael be
the wife of Heber the Kenite
blessed shall she be above women in the tent
